title: Conjeni
wikitext:
[[File:Conjeni.jpg|thumb|right|Conjeni]] '''Species:''' Conjeni
'''Home Planet:''' Conjeni
'''Conjeni''' Conjeni were sapients who resembled red-furred starfish. '''Conjeni in the Galaxy:'''
[[Durquist]] was a Conjeni pirating pilot who was associated with three other pirates: [[Bruce Mercy]], [[Morph]], and [[Ptak-Sok]]. '''''Attribute Dice:''''' 12D
DEXTERITY 2D/4D
KNOWLEDGE 1D+2/3D+1
MECHANICAL 3D/5D+1
PERCEPTION 2D/4D
STRENGTH 1D/3D+1
TECHNICAL 2D/4D '''Move:''' 9/11
'''Size:''' 1.5 meters tall
'''Source:''' Starwars Alienstats (p. 32) & Wookieepedia (For the Conjeni Description)
